name: Mystery Files: Hidden Objects
description:
Free to play puzzles, brain teasers and mini games of Mystery Files: Hidden Objects where you need to win mystery games and find hidden objects in every location! This is a library of Domini games and interactive stories you can choose from.

· Play your favorite puzzle games!
Choose your own point & click adventure! In a single app, you can play any quest you like. An easy-to-read progress meter is going to show you what hidden objects games you have already completed. Never choose between romance and detective genres - play both!

· Never get bored!
Are you worried about missing a brand new release from Domini? Not anymore! All of our newest detective games will be added to this wonderful collection. Any hidden object adventure quest you want - at arm’s length!

· Earn achievements!
Play and replay your favorite puzzles to earn achievements! Be the quickest one to uncover cleverly hidden object and show off your skill to your friends. Can you unlock them all?

· Gather your own collection!
Each of our thrilling adventures is full of secrets and mysteries. Be attentive while you travel unknown worlds and beautiful locations while you solve hide n seek interactive games! Morphing artifacts, notes that expand the story, and fun trinkets to gather. Will you be able to complete the whole collection?

Download Mystery Files: Hidden Objects - choose any quest you like and play for free! If you are interested in the bonus materials or need additional help, you can use the in-game store.
